name: Upgrade Sprout
description:
Instructions: Move left and right with "a" and "d," and press the spacebar to jump. Collect more water drops to jump higher!

Upgrade Sprout is a 2D platformer with the goal of upgrading your plant and collecting coins. Game was created with Godot, and the cover image was generated with DALL-E 2. I used game assets from the following itch.io users:

blueapollo, pixel-boy, Jesse Munguia

Created for the UF Global Game Jam '23
